Description: Upper portion from the judgement scene of a funerary papyrus roll of the Late Period, preserving only the cornice section of the judgment hall; now in seven fragments.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: William John Bankes
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134912) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134912)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: torn but solid
